title: Locked Camera Position
body: Do lots of people play in locked camera screen or unlocked camera screen

replies.body: Unlocked. If i want to lock it i just hold the spacebar.

This.

Its a quick and easy way to be jungling or farming and then quickly look bot lane for a sneaky tp or roam. You also get use to holding down the spacebar eventually.
when ever i use Lock. Seems like i am going to die in 5 sec T_T never play in lock screen it is so hard for me, sure it is easy to look in mini map but sometimes u dun care xD

Good/most players use unlocked.
I use locked.

realistically you can get away with having the camera permalocked all the way up to low gold though, as long as you pay attention to the minimap, and beyond that half locked practices can still be fine until you get to a really high level.
No... You can easily get to challenger with locked cam.
I play locked, but i spend more time looking at the minimap than i do anything else, so i don't need it unlocked

even though it's important to have map awareness and learn the unlocked camera, don't feel bad if you still use it from time to time. I use Y to unlock my camera pretty regularly and look across the map, especially when jungling, and in teamfights that are centered around a single clocation but whenever I need to do mechanical stuff I generally relock my camera. My camera is locked around 50/50.

> even though it's important to have map awareness and learn the unlocked camera, don't feel bad if you still use it from time to time. I use Y to unlock my camera pretty regularly and look across the map, especially when jungling, and in teamfights that are centered around a single clocation but whenever I need to do mechanical stuff I generally relock my camera. My camera is locked around 50/50.

This

Exactly what I do and the best way to play IMO, sure unlocked is great but in very mechanical situations it becomes quite difficult to keep up and often you're left on the edge of the screen, quite literally. If you master using the Y key to lock and unlock quickly you can effectively make use of both benefits of using each.
